verses.text: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* was crying \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* voice; \w even|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* voice, \w and|strong="H0623"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* gave ear \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w In|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* day \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H0413"\w* trouble, \w my|strong="H0413"\w* heart \w was|strong="H0430"\w* \w turned|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Lord: \w my|strong="H0413"\w* hand \w was|strong="H0430"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* night without resting; \w my|strong="H0413"\w* soul would not \w be|strong="H0430"\w* comforted.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* keep \w God|strong="H0136"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* memory, \w with|strong="H3027"\w* sounds \w of|strong="H3117"\w* grief; \w my|strong="H3027"\w* thoughts \w are|strong="H3117"\w* troubled, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H3027"\w* \w spirit|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* overcome. (Selah.)

\w You|strong="H2142"\w* \w keep|strong="H2142"\w* \w my|strong="H2142"\w* eyes \w from|strong="H0430"\w* sleep; \w I|strong="H7878"\w* \w am|strong="H0430"\w* so troubled \w that|strong="H2142"\w* no words \w come|strong="H2142"\w*.

\w My|strong="H1696"\w* thoughts go back \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* days \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* past, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* years \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w gone|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3117"\w* memory \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H2803"\w* song \w comes|strong="H3117"\w* back \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H2803"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* night; \w my|strong="H2803"\w* thoughts \w are|strong="H3117"\w* moving \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w my|strong="H2803"\w* heart; \w my|strong="H2803"\w* spirit \w is|strong="H3117"\w* searching \w with|strong="H3117"\w* care.

\w Will|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* Lord \w put|strong="H2142"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w* \w away|strong="H5973"\w* \w for|strong="H5973"\w* ever? \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w he|strong="H7307"\w* \w be|strong="H3915"\w* kind no longer?

\w Is|strong="H0136"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* mercy quite \w gone|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*? \w has|strong="H0136"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* word come \w to|strong="H3254"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w*?
\w Has|strong="H5331"\w* God put away the memory \w of|strong="H1755"\w* his pity? are his mercies shut up by his wrath? (Selah.)

\w And|strong="H0639"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* said, \w It|strong="H0518"\w* \w is|strong="H0410"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* weight \w on|strong="H0639"\w* \w my|strong="H0518"\w* spirit; \w but|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H0410"\w* keep \w in|strong="H0410"\w* mind \w the|strong="H0518"\w* years \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* right hand \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* Most High.

\w I|strong="H8141"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* keep \w in|strong="H8141"\w* mind \w the|strong="H0559"\w* works \w of|strong="H8141"\w* Jah: \w I|strong="H8141"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* keep \w the|strong="H0559"\w* memory \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w your|strong="H0559"\w* wonders \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* past.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* will give \w thought|strong="H2142"\w* \w to|strong="H2142"\w* all \w your|strong="H3588"\w* work, \w while|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w mind|strong="H2142"\w* goes over \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w acts|strong="H2142"\w* \w of|strong="H4611"\w* power.
\w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H3605"\w*, O God, \w is|strong="H3605"\w* holy: \w what|strong="H6467"\w* god \w is|strong="H3605"\w* so great as \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God?

\w You|strong="H1870"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* does works \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w power|strong="H0410"\w*: \w you|strong="H1870"\w* \w have|strong="H0430"\w* made \w your|strong="H0430"\w* strength clear \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* nations.

\w With|strong="H3045"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* arm \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* free, \w the|strong="H3045"\w* sons \w of|strong="H0410"\w* Jacob \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H5971"\w*. (Selah.)

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* waters saw \w you|strong="H5971"\w*, O God; \w the|strong="H1121"\w* waters saw \w you|strong="H5971"\w*, \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* fear: even \w the|strong="H1121"\w* deep \w was|strong="H1121"\w* troubled.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* clouds sent \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; \w the|strong="H7200"\w* skies gave \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* sound; \w truly|strong="H0637"\w*, \w your|strong="H7200"\w* arrows went far \w and|strong="H0430"\w* wide.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w thunder|strong="H6963"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* rolling \w on|strong="H1980"\w*; \w the|strong="H5414"\w* world \w was|strong="H4325"\w* flaming \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* light \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* storm; \w the|strong="H5414"\w* earth \w was|strong="H4325"\w* shaking.

\w Your|strong="H0776"\w* way \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* sea, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w your|strong="H0776"\w* road \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* great waters; there \w was|strong="H0776"\w* no knowledge \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w your|strong="H0776"\w* footsteps.

\w You|strong="H3045"\w* \w were|strong="H4325"\w* guiding \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* flock, \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* hand \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Moses|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H1870"\w* Aaron.
